item.title: Protest over proposed ethanol plant turns violent in Telangana, 12 arrested
item.description:
<![CDATA[Twelve people were arrested in connection with a violent protest at the site of a proposed ethanol plant in the Jogulamba Gadwal district of Telangana.
The incident occurred on Wednesday, June 4, when a large group of villagers gathered near Pedda Dhanwada village in Rajoli mandal (administrative subdivision) in the same district, demanding that the state government revoke its approval for the project.
advertisement
The protesters from seven to eight of the nearby villages allegedly set fire ...]]>
